question: 究明
sourceMnemonic:
<kanji>Research</kanji> is the process of <kanji>brighten</kanji>ing a subject area, akin to conducting an <vocabulary>investigation</vocabulary> that illuminates the unknown.

This is a word often found in academic and scientific contexts, encompassing the act of conducting a thorough investigation or ascertaining facts.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
